author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CTI Industries Q1 Loss Per Share $0.13
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - CTI Industries Corp:
* CTI INDUSTRIES ANNOUNCES 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 SALES $14 MILLION VERSUS $15.4 MILLION * FOR 2018 EXPECTS TO GENERATE HIGHER NET SALES, LOWER TOTAL OPERATING EXPENSES, AND OPERATE PROFITABLY VERSUS 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
